messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] sick commercials ...
messages.msgSnippet: Well, they should take pictures of the kidlets when we un school shop. All the other kids are out school shopping, so we do lists of project and go and buy
messages.messageBody:
Well, they should take pictures of the kidlets when we "un" school shop.
All the other kids are out school shopping, so we do lists of project and
go and buy kits and plans and fun stuff to do. We just bought one of those
little sticker cameras and youngest kidlet is going to do cyclist licenses
(she says that way she can give her brother a ticket for parking his
bicycle where it doesn't belong) and passport for her dolls so they can
travel the world.

Of course, the pictures would be of happy kids who AREN'T going to school.

Lynda

----------
> From: Pris <x_t_sipr@...>
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] sick commercials ...
> Date: Monday, September 04, 2000 11:19 AM
>
>
> orrrrrrr, how about the Wal Mart (I think it was WM) commercial w/ dad
> racing up/down the aisles throwing school supplies in the basket while
the
> kids stood @ the end of the aisle looking SO FORLORNED!!! I thought
that
> was *SAD* ... ohhhhh, I HOPE AND PRAY I *NEVER* snuff out my fellas
desire
> to *LEARN* ...
>
> Pris
> WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my
cats
> have learned how to type ...
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Lynda" <lurine@...>
> To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, September 04, 2000 1:18 PM
> Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] TX TAAS test
>
> > How about the commercials last year about back to school shopping and
the
> > dad drives away with the bag on top of the car and the kids are totally
> > delighted that all the school stuff is sailing off and down the road.
> >
> > Lynda
>
